attributes.action: Keep F1 on Free to Air!!!
attributes.additional_details:
the concorde agreement in f1 specifically and explicitly states that F1 coverage MUST be free to air for ALL races. How can the move to sky sports @ £22.50 PER MONTH be classified as free to air?
the gorvernment MUST step in to prevent this travesty against the british public who already fund the bbc as it is via the television license and refuse to pay an "EXTRA PREMIUM" to view a sport that is meant to be FREE!!!!
